bioAsHtml: Julien Truffaut is the author of Monocle, an optics library for scala mainly inspired by haskell lens. He also participates in a few open source project such as scalaz, cats or http4s.

acceptedTalks.title: Typeclass 101: ad hoc polymorphism in scala

bio:
Julien Truffaut is the author of Monocle, an optics library for scala mainly inspired by haskell lens. 
He also participates in a few open source project such as scalaz, cats or http4s.
